import React from 'react' import { useContext,useEffect,useState } from 'react' import { CartContext } from '../CartContext' const Cart = () => { const {cart} = useContext(CartContext) console.log("hey_all",cart) if(cart.items){ console.log("rushee",Object.keys(cart.items)) fetch('https://star-spark-pasta.glitch.me/api/products/', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ ids: Object.keys(cart.items)}) }).then(res => res.json()) .then(products => { console.log(products) }) } return ( <>

Cart items

  • Double Peproni
    2
    $ 500
Grand Total: $1000
) } export default Cart
